name: Don’t get Angry TwichChat - Twich integrated game
name_original: Don’t get Angry TwichChat - Twich integrated game
description:
Don’t get Angry TwichChat

This game is adaptation of the popular tabletop game known as Man, don’t get angry or Ludo game. But now you can play it with your fellow viewers on Twitch. 

Goal of the game is to move all your pawns to end zone. Looks like easy task, but don’t be hasty. This peacefull looking game can quickly change to an open war.

How it works :

The game itself has twitch bot in it, juts fill your twitch channel name in when you are creating game and it’s all done.

Now the bot reads messages in your chat and people can use commands to join teams and vote which pawn should move. If you are afraid having chat full of spam, don’t worry, just change bot settings to whispers only. ( Please note that only move commands work in whispers, )

I hope you will enjoy the game :P
